title: Audrey Chen
snippet: AUDREY CHEN is a 2nd generation Chinese/Taiwanese-American musician who was born into a family of material scientists, doctors and engineers, outside of Chicago in 1976. Parting ways with the family convention, she turned to the cello at age 8 and voice at 11. After years of classical and conservatory training in both instruments, with a resulting specialization in early and new music, she ...

title: Projects — Audrey Chen
snippet: AUDREY CHEN / PHIL MINTON (voices) With primary focus on the interplay between the uttered sounds of the mouth and vocal chords, Minton and Chen plumb the depths of their most inherent and bodily instruments. Their improvisations are fearless, fragile, hungry, passionate, riotous, ululating and animalistic, yet are also in all respects, human.

title: Events — Audrey Chen
snippet: Audrey Chen (born in 1976 into a Chinese-Taiwanese-US-American family) is a guest in January. She understands her voice as a medium of experimental music like few others.

title: Home | Audrey Chen, cello
snippet: Praised for her "lyricism of dramatic intensity" (San Francisco Classical Voice) and "longevity of phrasing" (Boston Musical Intelligencer), Washington state native and cellist Audrey Chen has performed around the world in venues including Carnegie Hall, Sumitomolife Izumi Hall, Melbourne Recital Center, Royal Albert Hall, and the ...

title: Audrey Chen - 2024-25 - Women's Basketball - Cornell University
snippet: Audrey Lana Chen is the daughter of Charles and Lisa Chen and has one sister ... her sister, Ellie Chen, is a guard at San Diego State University ... she is enrolled in the College of Engineering.

title: BIOGRAPHY - Audrey Chen, cello
snippet: Audrey Chen is a Washington native and a cellist with a diverse solo and chamber music career. She is also a teacher, a scholar, and a recipient of several awards and fellowships.
